sentences.sContent: Those white brownish domes are what's called "yurt", the homes of ancient people, but also today.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those white brownish domes are what's called "yurt", the homes of ancient people, but also today.
sentences.sCn: 这些白褐色的穹顶是所谓的“蒙古包”，古时候人们的家，今天亦是如此。

sentences.sContent: Hard yellowish to brownish wax from leaves of the carnauba palm used especially in floor waxes and polishes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hard yellowish to brownish wax from leaves of the carnauba palm used especially in floor waxes and polishes.
sentences.sCn: 一种硬蜡，黄色至棕色，取自巴西棕榈树的叶子，尤用来制地板蜡和上光剂。

words.tran: 棕色的，褐色的；太阳晒黑的
上流社会的；富有阶级的
赤褐色砂石建筑；褐色砂石
